Content:: The Headquarters of the Supreme Commander-in-Chief (Ukrainian: Ставка Верховного Головнокомандувача) is the highest command and control body for the troops and individual branches of the Ukrainian military, as well as law enforcement services and agencies of Ukraine, which are part of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, formed by decree of the President of Ukraine No. 72/2022 dated February 24, 2022 in response to the Russian invasion of Ukraine on that day.[1][2][3][4]
Title: Headquarters of the Supreme Commander-in-Chief - Wikipedia
